nodes.text: Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack

The Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack is a supplement to the tactical naval warfare game, Star Wars: Armada, published by Fantasy Flight Games, and part of the fifth wave. The expansion features detailed miniatures of the TIE/ph Phantoms, TIE/D Defenders, the Lambda-class T-4a shuttle, and the VT-49 Decimator. It was announced on August 5, 2016 alongside the Phoenix Home Expansion Pack, the Imperial Light Cruiser Expansion Pack, and the Rebel Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack.

The Empire's most advanced attack craft bring monstrous power into battle in the Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack for Star Wars™: Armada. Elusive TIE Phantoms ambush Rebel squadrons, while elite TIE Defenders outmatch the enemy with fearsome capabilities, and hulking VT-49 Decimators leave only wreckage in their wake. Supported by the coordination ability of Lambda-class shuttles, these eight miniature squadrons and eight squadron cards work hard to crush the Rebel opposition.
The Imperial Fighter Squadrons II Expansion Pack contains sixteen miniatures (eight miniatures overall), plus a maneuver dials and action tokens, as well as ship and upgrade cards.
